Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.controllers.analytics_controller module

Author: Samiul Ahamed Fhyas

class controllers.analytics_controller.AnalyticsController[source]

Bases: object

Controller for analytics and statistics.

static get_stats()[source]

Get comprehensive analytics statistics for the dashboard.

Returns:

(dict with statistics including:

  • total_routes (int): Total number of routes

  • top_routes (list): Top 10 routes by frequency

  • top_destinations (list): Top 8 destinations

  • bus_type_distribution (list): Count of AC vs Non-AC buses

  • fare_comparison (list): Average fare by operator

HTTP status code 200).

Return type:

tuple
